dxf2svg.util
Class GraphicLinksDatabaseReader

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.util.GraphicLinksDatabaseReader
public class GraphicLinksDatabaseReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class is called by the DxfPreprocessor and opens, reads the Graphic Links Database then retains the database for query until the application stops. Since the database is not modified - only referenced during conversion, the database is not reserialized. This means that numerous application could read the database at the same time.

Version:
0.01 - October 5, 2004
Author:
Andrew Nisbet

Constructor Summary
GraphicLinksDatabaseReader(java.lang.String location)
          The location argument is the directory of the graphic link database WITHOUT the name of the database.

Constructor Detail

GraphicLinksDatabaseReader

public GraphicLinksDatabaseReader(java.lang.String location)
The location argument is the directory of the graphic link database WITHOUT the name of the database. The name of the database is standardized to GraphicLinkDatabase.ser and cannot be changed.

Method Detail

getFigureIdForSpotCall

public java.lang.String getFigureIdForSpotCall(java.lang.String spotCall)
Returns the graphic linking database to the caller.

Returns:
null if the database could not be found by the path passed as a constructor argument or the figureid of the spotcall is not in the database.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a String representation of this object, which in this case is the contents of the database. Null will be returned if the database could not be found.
